mapper.insert:

id,
waybill_code,
schedule_bill_code,
business_type,
business_batch_code,
parent_order_id,
dest_dms_site_code,
package_num,
carrier_name,
schedule_time,
business_update_time,
create_time,
yn,
ts,
) values (
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scheduleBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{businessBatchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parentOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{destDmsSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{scheduleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{businessUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
now(),
#{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
)
mapper.update:
update dms_schedule_info
id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schedule_bill_code = #{scheduleBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
business_batch_code = #{businessBatchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_order_id = #{parentOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dest_dms_site_code = #{destDmsSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
package_num = #{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
carrier_name = #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
schedule_time = #{scheduleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
business_update_time = #{businessUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dms_schedule_info set schedule_bill_code = #{scheduleBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, business_type = #{businessType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dest_dms_site_code = #{destDmsSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, package_num = #{packageNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carrier_name = #{carrierName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, schedule_time = #{scheduleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (schedule_time is null or schedule_time < #{scheduleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
select
from dms_schedule_info t where yn = 1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from dms_schedule_info t where yn = 1 and waybill_code = #{waybillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select count(1) as num from dms_schedule_info

select count(1) as num from ( select count(1) as num from dms_schedule_info
group by schedule_bill_code) t

select schedule_bill_code,max(carrier_name) as carrier_name,max(schedule_time) as schedule_time from dms_schedule_info t
group by schedule_bill_code order by max(schedule_time) limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select schedule_bill_code,max(carrier_name) as carrier_name,max(schedule_time) as schedule_time from dms_schedule_info t
and schedule_bill_code = #{scheduleBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by schedule_bill_code

select business_batch_code from dms_schedule_info t
and business_batch_code is not null and schedule_bill_code = #{scheduleBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by business_batch_code

select
from dms_schedule_info t
and schedule_bill_code = #{scheduleBillCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by schedule_time
